subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jodhpur?
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort is the famous fort located in Jodhpur.
explanation_hi: मेहरांगर, Jodhpur में उसे ही है।
explanation_hin: Jodhpur ka Mehrangarh Fort यह सभी वर्गों ke liye मैंने बना।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first Ranas of Chittor?
question_hi: चित्तोर के पहले समाज के नौसेंने किए गए।
explanation_en: Rana Kumbha was the first Rana of Chittor. In Hindi, it can be translated as 'राना कुम्ब्ह चित्तोर की पहले समाज
explanation_hi: राना कुम्ब्ह ये चित्तोर की पहले समाज

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rana ruled Rajasthan before Rana Kumbh?
question_hi: पहले राना कुम्ब्ह के पहले समाज
